languages.text: "Только хочу спросить — вы уверены, что готовы все решить сейчас? Не хотите пообщаться со всеми сторонами, составить мнение о претендентах?"
"Let me just ask you — are you sure you're ready to resolve everything now? Maybe you'd like to talk to all sides, form your own opinion of the claimants?"
languages.original_text: "Только хочу спросить — вы уверены, что готовы все решить сейчас? Не хотите пообщаться со всеми сторонами, составить мнение о претендентах?"

traits.locale_text: "Let me just ask you — are you sure you're ready to resolve everything now? Maybe you'd like to talk to all sides, form your own opinion of the claimants?"
traits.speaker: SideQuestChaplain

traits.locale_text: "Let me just ask you — are you sure you're ready to resolve everything now? Maybe you'd like to talk to all sides, form your own opinion of the claimants?"
traits.speaker: SideQuestChaplain

traits.locale_text: "Let me just ask you — are you sure you're ready to resolve everything now? Maybe you'd like to talk to all sides, form your own opinion of the claimants?"
traits.speaker: SideQuestChaplain

traits.locale_text: "Let me just ask you — are you sure you're ready to resolve everything now? Maybe you'd like to talk to all sides, form your own opinion of the claimants?"
traits.speaker: SideQuestChaplain

traits.locale_text: "Let me just ask you — are you sure you're ready to resolve everything now? Maybe you'd like to talk to all sides, form your own opinion of the claimants?"
traits.speaker: SideQuestChaplain

languages.text: “我只想问你一个问题：你确定你已经准备好彻底解决这个问题了吗？或许你可以和所有人都谈谈，确定你关于继承人的看法？”
languages.original_text: "Let me just ask you — are you sure you're ready to resolve everything now? Maybe you'd like to talk to all sides, form your own opinion of the claimants?"

traits.locale_text: “我只想问你一个问题：你确定你已经准备好彻底解决这个问题了吗？或许你可以和所有人都谈谈，确定你关于继承人的看法？”
traits.speaker: SideQuestChaplain

languages.text: «Deje que le pregunte: ¿está segur{mf|o|a} de que ya sabe todo lo que necesita para resolver esto? ¿No quiere hablar con todos los involucrados y formar una opinión propia sobre los pretendientes?».
languages.original_text: "Let me just ask you — are you sure you're ready to resolve everything now? Maybe you'd like to talk to all sides, form your own opinion of the claimants?"

traits.locale_text: «Deje que le pregunte: ¿está segur{mf|o|a} de que ya sabe todo lo que necesita para resolver esto? ¿No quiere hablar con todos los involucrados y formar una opinión propia sobre los pretendientes?».
traits.speaker: SideQuestChaplain

languages.text: 「ひとつだけお聞きします。今すぐにこの件に決着をつける覚悟はおありですか？あらゆる視点から話を聞いて、相続人の候補者についてあなたなりの結論を出してみてはいかがでしょうか？」
languages.original_text: "Let me just ask you — are you sure you're ready to resolve everything now? Maybe you'd like to talk to all sides, form your own opinion of the claimants?"

traits.locale_text: 「ひとつだけお聞きします。今すぐにこの件に決着をつける覚悟はおありですか？あらゆる視点から話を聞いて、相続人の候補者についてあなたなりの結論を出してみてはいかがでしょうか？」
traits.speaker: SideQuestChaplain

languages.text: "Nur eine Frage – seid Ihr sicher, dass Ihr jetzt alles abwickeln wollt? Vielleicht möchtet Ihr noch mit allen Beteiligten sprechen, Euch selbst eine Meinung über die Anwärter bilden?"
languages.original_text: "Let me just ask you — are you sure you're ready to resolve everything now? Maybe you'd like to talk to all sides, form your own opinion of the claimants?"

traits.locale_text: "Nur eine Frage – seid Ihr sicher, dass Ihr jetzt alles abwickeln wollt? Vielleicht möchtet Ihr noch mit allen Beteiligten sprechen, Euch selbst eine Meinung über die Anwärter bilden?"
traits.speaker: SideQuestChaplain

languages.text: « Mais avant d'aller plus loin, êtes-vous vraiment {mf|certain|certaine} d'être {mf|prêt|prête} à clore cette affaire ? Ne voulez-vous pas parler à toutes les parties impliquées dans cette affaire et former votre propre opinion à leur sujet ? »
languages.original_text: "Let me just ask you — are you sure you're ready to resolve everything now? Maybe you'd like to talk to all sides, form your own opinion of the claimants?"

traits.locale_text: « Mais avant d'aller plus loin, êtes-vous vraiment {mf|certain|certaine} d'être {mf|prêt|prête} à clore cette affaire ? Ne voulez-vous pas parler à toutes les parties impliquées dans cette affaire et former votre propre opinion à leur sujet ? »
traits.speaker: SideQuestChaplain

languages.text: "Meseleyi hemen çözüme kavuşturmak istediğinizden emin misiniz peki? Belki diğer taraflarla da konuşup, hak iddia edenlere dair fikir edinmek isteyebilirsiniz."
languages.original_text: "Let me just ask you — are you sure you're ready to resolve everything now? Maybe you'd like to talk to all sides, form your own opinion of the claimants?"

traits.locale_text: "Her şeyi hemen çözmek istediğinize emin misiniz? Belki diğer taraflarla da konuşup hak sahipleri hakkında bir fikir edinmek isteyebilirsiniz."
traits.speaker: SideQuestChaplain
